ticker: Return every Saturday night for live DJs!
Join our Discord and the VRChat group using the buttons on the station concourse!

event.top: It's the last night of summer at...
ticker: Please do not attempt to retrieve items dropped below the platform, they are ours now.
Remember to remain internally moist and hydrate at regular intervals throughout your journey today.
Get all station announcements via our Discord and the VRChat group. Use the buttons on the station concourse!

performers.name: Wrath
ticker: First train calling at both Psytrance and Techno.
Follow Wrath at https://www.youtube.com/@DJ_Wrath46

performers.name: Fear the Feer
ticker: This service is calling at: House, only.
Follow Feer at https://twitter.com/RaveTheFeer

performers.name: Ovtlvndish
ticker: Please welcome our new DJ playing their first night at the Bass Station proper!
This new DJ will be taking you to Tech House and Bass House!
Follow Ovtlvndish at https://twitter.com/Outland1shVR

performers.name: Japhet
ticker: Express service to: Mainstage
'Remember to be the change you want to see'
Follow Japhet at https://twitter.com/MSGspike

performers.name: Liquid Bass
ticker: Final train, calling at Oldschool Hardstyle.
Follow Liquid at https://linktr.ee/djliquidbass

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. We wish you the best with your onward journey!
See you all next week!
Get all station announcements via our Discord and the VRChat group. Use the buttons on the station concourse!
